text: Vehicle armour is a protective layer that is used to protect vehicles from weapons. Vehicle armor is usually found on military vehicles like tanks, fighter planes, and armoured cars. Vehicle armor is also sometimes used for normal vehicles, like armoured bank vehicles and cars used to transport important people like elected officials. Vehicle armor is also sometimes used to protect vehicles from things other than attacks. Some vehicles, like satellites, use vehicle armor to stay safe from danger that comes from the environment. armour
title: Vehicle armour
